name: Ausangate Trek 5D/4N
description: The Cordillera Vilcanota is an impressive range of mountains which include the massive Nevado de Ausangate (6370m). It is an excellent trekking country offering the travellers a combination of spectacular mountain scenery, snow-capped peaks, turquoise lakes, hot springs, glaciers, herds of llamas, alpacas and local Quechua farming weaving communities who are still living almost like in the Inca time. This beautiful five day circular trek start and finishes at the small village of Tinki and take you around the massive Ausangate Mountain and it goes over the high passes (5050m) with unforgettable views of the mountains.
